file_content.text: You friend of Jawa people. Very nice for outsider! Maybe too tall, but nice!
Jawas come back! You do good work!
You didn't have any more trouble while I was gone?
Is everyone alright?
Stinky Sand People stay away for now. Big bugs still here, but save that for later.
You're welcome.
All finished?
You ever need droid, maybe we give discount!
Jawas like you now! Maybe you talk to Renishi, okay?
Go free Jawas from Sand People cages!
You outsider, yes? Outsiders enemies of Sand People!
Jawa not like Sand People so much either. You help us with Sand People, maybe we be friends?
Exactly what are the benefits of being friends with the Jawa?
Interesting offer.
Jawa know lots of things outsiders need! Know all about desert! Also get good deals on droid parts!
I'm not sure I'm authorized to negotiate a treaty between the Republic and Jawas.
You want an alliance?
No talks! Just be friends! Jawa best friends in whole desert!
There's nothing the Republic needs with a bunch of little desert scavengers.
That's not beneficial.
Jawa know desert! Know places to hide! Places to find things! How not to fall in sarlacc!
Off the top of my head, I can't think of even one reason I'd want to be friends with a bunch of Jawas.
Why would I want that?
Jawa make very good friends! We know whole desert! Best places for salvage! Also get you good prices on slightly used droids!
What help do you need?
We do have a mutual enemy.
Krikit knew you look like smart outsider!
Sand People come here, take many Jawas, lock Jawas up in cages.
You go, beat up Sand People, get Jawas back! Then, everyone happy! Except Sand People, but that okay.
Wait here, I'll have your people freed in no time.
I'll be back with your people.
Really? You very nice for outsider! Even nicer than Hutts!
Don't you have droids to help?
We try, but Sand People too strong for Jawa.
Help free Jawas, we be your best friends ever! Promise!
We keep lookout. Hope to see Jawas come home soon!
No thanks. [Refuse quest]
We find someone else, maybe? Then they be Jawa friends and you be sorry!
Jawa need help. Someone strong come help soon, yes?
